Integer.Description: Exposure time in microseconds

Enumeration.Description: Change image resolution by binning or skipping.

Integer.Description: Width of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Height of the Image provided by the device (in pixels).
Horizontal offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Vertical offset from the origin to the area of interest (in pixels).
Automatic exposure/gain ROI offset X
Automatic exposure/gain ROI offset Y
Automatic exposure/gain ROI Width
Automatic exposure/gain ROI Height

Boolean.Description: Correction of sensor defects (pixels, columns, rows) enable/disable

Integer.Description: Sets the number of times of exposure in one frame.

String.Description: Set name of file to be applied for FFC processor.
Set name of file to be applied for FFC processor.

Enumeration.Description: Selector of list used by Sensor Defects Correction parameter

Boolean.Description: Correction of sensor defects (pixels, columns, rows) enable/disable

Integer.Description: Maximum time (us) used for exposure in AEAG procedure

Float.Description: Maximum limit of gain in AEAG procedure

Integer.Description: Average intensity of output signal AEAG should achieve(in %)

Boolean.Description: Returns 1 if camera connected and works properly.

Integer.Description: Acquisition buffer size in buffer_size_unit. Default bytes.
Acquisition buffer size unit in bytes. Default 1. E.g. Value 1024 means that buffer_size is in KiBytes
Acquisition transport buffer size in bytes
Queue of field/frame buffers

Command.Description: Resets the camera to default state.

Enumeration.Description: Current sensor mode. Allows to select sensor mode by one integer. Setting of this parameter affects: image dimensions and downsampling.

Integer.Description: The number of kneepoints in the PWLR.
position of first kneepoint(in % of XI_PRM_EXPOSURE)
position of second kneepoint (in % of XI_PRM_EXPOSURE)
value of first kneepoint (% of sensor saturation)
value of second kneepoint (% of sensor saturation)
Last image black level counts. Can be used for Offline processing to recall it.

String.Description: Returns version of current device driver.

Boolean.Description: Enables (2015/FAPI) processing chain for MQ MU cameras. If disabled - legacy processing 2006 is used.

String.Description: Read file from camera flash filesystem.
Write file to camera flash filesystem.
Set name of file to be written/read from camera FFS.

Enumeration.Description: bitdepth of data returned by function xiGetImage

Boolean.Description: Device output data packing (or grouping) enabled. Packing could be enabled if output_data_bit_depth > 8 and packing capability is available.

Enumeration.Description: Data packing type. Some cameras supports only specific packing type.

Integer.Description: Set/get bandwidth(datarate)(in Megabits)
Selects register of selected device unit(XI_PRM_DEVICE_UNIT_SELECTOR).
Sets/gets register value of selected device unit(XI_PRM_DEVICE_UNIT_SELECTOR).

Enumeration.Description: Selects the current feature which is accessible by XI_PRM_SENSOR_FEATURE_VALUE.

Integer.Description: Allows access to sensor feature value currently selected by XI_PRM_SENSOR_FEATURE_SELECTOR.

Boolean.Description: Returns 1 for cameras that support cooling.

Enumeration.Description: Selector of mechanical point where thermometer is located.
Returns color filter array type of RAW data.

Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. XI_PRM_TRG_SOURCE must be set to TRG_SOFTWARE.

Integer.Description: Sets number of frames acquired by burst. This burst is used only if trigger is set to FrameBurstStart
GPI level
GPI Level at image exposure end
Debounce time (x * 10us)
Debounce time (x * 10us)
Return device model id

String.Description: Represents the location of the device in the device tree.

Integer.Description: Buffer size in bytes sufficient for output image returned by xiGetImage

Enumeration.Description: Number of output channels from sensor used for data transfer.

Integer.Description: Counter status
Measure and return available interface bandwidth(int Megabits)
Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the LUT.
Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT

Enumeration.Description: Defines how time stamp reset engine will be armed
Defines which source will be used for timestamp reset. Writing this parameter will trigger settings of engine (arming)
